alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds a sulfenyl group with the general formula RS (R = organyl).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfenyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds containing a thioether group that is substituted by two alkyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dialkylthioethers

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl chloride functional group with formula R-Cl , where R is an alkyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl chlorides

class.description: Compounds containing the ester derivative of thiocarboxylic acid, with the general structure R-S-R' (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
class.name: Thioethers

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as sulfur mustard compounds. These are compounds containing having two beta-haloalkyl groups bound to a sulfur atom.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing having two beta-haloalkyl groups bound to a sulfur atom.
direct_parent.name: Sulfur mustard compounds

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing having two beta-haloalkyl groups bound to a sulfur atom.
subclass.name: Sulfur mustard compounds

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing a carbon-sulfur bond.
superclass.name: Organosulfur compounds
